getSignatureBundle(QuorumMap storage,uin.notice: get quorum signature bundle consisting of the info, signatories and the corresponding signatures.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct EnumerableSet.AddressSet storage pointer,address) view returns (bool)
function (struct EnumerableSet.AddressSet storage pointer) view returns (address[] memory)

documentation.text:
@notice returns the needed weight value corresponding to the majority percentage
 @dev `majorityPercentage` must be a valid number

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct EnumerableSet.AddressSet storage pointer) view returns (address[] memory)
tuple(struct QuorumInfo memory,address[] memory,bytes memory[] memory)
